items.input: Firm: NexPhase Capital, Company: Behavior Frontiers

conversationHistory.content:
For the given portfolio company, find its headquarters location. Use the PE firm name as context to help identify the correct company. Use perplexity_search or research_legal_entity to find city and state of headquarters, complete address if possible, and verify this is the main operational headquarters. Include the PE firm context in your searches to ensure accuracy. Return results as JSON: {"company_name": "Company Name", "firm_name": "PE Firm Name", "headquarters_location": {"city": "City Name", "state": "State", "full_address": "Complete address if found", "research_confidence": "high/medium/low"}}. Include only the formatted JSON in your response, exclude any other text or comments.

Inputs:
input: Firm: NexPhase Capital, Company: Behavior Frontiers

content.text: Let me search for information about Behavior Frontiers' headquarters, using NexPhase Capital as context.

input.query: Behavior Frontiers headquarters location NexPhase Capital portfolio company

content.content:
{
  "content": [
    {
      "type": "text",
      "text": "Behavior Frontiers’ headquarters is at 100 N Pacific Coast Highway, Suite 1400, El Segundo, CA 90245.[1][3]

- The company lists this address on its official Contact page and employment materials as its **Headquarters** location.[1][3]
- Recent coverage of NexPhase Capital’s acquisition also describes Behavior Frontiers as Los Angeles-based, consistent with the El Segundo headquarters.[4]
- NexPhase Capital announced the acquisition of Behavior Frontiers on May 5, 2025, noting the company operates 26 centers across 12 states.[2]

Sources:
1. https://www.behaviorfrontiers.com/contact
2. https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/nexphase-announces-acquisition-of-behavior-frontiers-302445786.html
3. https://www.behaviorfrontiers.com/employment-interest-form
4. https://www.beckersbehavioralhealth.com/behavioral-health-capital-investment/aba-clinic-chain-changes-hands/
5. https://www.bhcoe.org/aba-therapy/behavior-frontiers-el-segundo-california-90245/

content.text: Let me search for information about Behavior Frontiers and its relationship with NexPhase Capital.

input.query: Behavior Frontiers NexPhase Capital portfolio company investment acquisition current status

content.content:
{
  "content": [
    {
      "type": "text",
      "text": "Behavior Frontiers was acquired by private equity firm NexPhase Capital on May 5, 2025; terms were not disclosed, and the existing leadership team, including CEO Helen Mader, remains in place under NexPhase’s ownership[5][3]. The company operates roughly 26 centers with home-based services across 12 states, supported by its proprietary PrioraCare software platform[5][1].

Key details
- Buyer and timing: **NexPhase Capital** announced the acquisition of **Behavior Frontiers** on May 5, 2025; press releases from both companies confirm the deal[5][3]. Industry outlets and advisors (Behavioral Health Business; TripleTree) also reported the transaction the same day[1][4].  
- Deal terms: **Financial terms were not disclosed**[5][2].  
- Management continuity: Behavior Frontiers’ **current executive team continues to lead** the company post-transaction; NexPhase Operating Partners Barbara Hill and John Kill will support growth initiatives[1][5].  
- Prior sponsor: **Lorient Capital** previously backed Behavior Frontiers and supported expansion; reporting notes it’s unclear whether Lorient retains any stake post-transaction[1]. Behavior Frontiers’ release frames the NexPhase deal as a sale following a growth phase under Lorient’s ownership[3].  
- Company footprint and platform: Behavior Frontiers provides **ABA therapy** via **26 centers** plus home-based care in **12 states**, leveraging **PrioraCare** practice management software[5][1].  
- Investment profile: NexPhase is a lower middle-market PE firm targeting **control buyouts** in healthcare, software, and consumer, with typical equity checks of **$40–$150 million**; specific check size for this deal was not disclosed[2].

Current status summary
- Portfolio company: Behavior Frontiers is now a **NexPhase Capital portfolio company** following the May 2025 acquisition[5].  
- Integration/strategy: NexPhase cites plans to support expansion into existing and new markets, working alongside the existing leadership and adding operating partner support[5][1].  
- Unresolved/undisclosed: Deal valuation and whether Lorient retains any minority interest remain **undisclosed/unclear** based on available reporting[1][5].

Sources:
1. https://bhbusiness.com/2025/05/05/national-autism-therapy-provider-behavior-frontiers-sells-to-nexphase-capital/
2. https://www.jdsupra.com/legalnews/healthcare-life-sciences-private-equity-6786343/
3. https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/behavior-frontiers-announces-sale-to-nexphase-capital-302445660.html
4. http://www.triple-tree.com/experience/behavior-frontiers-nexphase-capital/
5. https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/nexphase-announces-acquisition-of-behavior-frontiers-302445786.html


(Results from Perplexity sonar-pro)"
    }
  ],
  "isError": false
